name: Baby Takes a Nap
description: The herbal side of gin complements the chamomile in this simple cocktail. Honey adds depth to the flavor.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces strong chamomile tea, brewed and cooled (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Add gin, tea, honey simple syrup, and orange bitters to a cocktail shaker and fill 2/3 full with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into coupe glass and serve.
